resort.blurb: With a top elevation of 12,510 feet or 3,813 meters, Aspen Snowmass has 98 runs. Fly in Denver International Airport (DEN) and it is a 3 hr 48 min drive to the ski resort.
With a top elevation of 9,570 feet or 2,917 meters, Deer Valley has 103 runs. Fly into Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC) and it is a 45 min drive to the ski resort.
With a top elevation of 3,640 feet or 1,110 meters, Smugglers' Notch has 78 runs. Fly into Burlington International Airport (BTV) and it is a 50 min drive to the ski resort.
With a top elevation of 9,150 feet or 2,789 meters, Sun Valley has 120 runs. Fly into Friedman Memorial Airport (SUN) and it is a 25 min drive to the ski resort.
With a top elevation of 3,100 feet or 945 meters, Bretton Woods has 98 runs. Fly into Manchester-Boston Regional Airport (MHT) and it is a 1 hr 45 min drive to the ski resort.
With a top elevation of 4,241 feet or 1,293 meters, Killington has 155 runs. Fly into Burlington International Airport (BTV) and it is a 1 hr 46 min drive to the ski resort.

With a top elevation of 6,817 feet or 2,078 meters, Whitefish has 111 runs. Fly into Glacier Park International Airport (GPI) and it is a 31 min drive to the ski resort.
With a top elevation of 12,998 feet of 3,962 meters, Breckenridge has 187 runs. Fly in Denver International Airport (DEN) and it is a 1 hr 51 min drive to the ski resort.
